meta.title: Privacy & Cookies - Eye On Idea
meta.description: Privacy policy and cookie policy for Eye On Idea. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.

hero.title: Privacy & Cookies
hero.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
content: Eye On Idea (CVR: 45356175) is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal data in compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
By using our website or engaging our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this privacy policy.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller
content: Eye On Idea is the data controller for personal data collected through this website and our services.
Contact: hello{'@'}eyeonidea.com

dataCollected.title: 3. Data We Collect
content: Contact form submissions: Name, email address, phone number (optional), company name (optional), and message content.
Project engagements: Business contact details, project requirements, and communication history necessary for service delivery.
Website analytics: Anonymous usage data such as pages visited, time on site, and general geographic location (country level).
We do not collect sensitive personal data or data about minors.

purpose.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
content: To respond to your inquiries and provide requested information.
To deliver contracted services and manage client relationships.
To improve our website and services based on usage patterns.
To comply with legal obligations.
We will never sell your personal data to third parties or use it for purposes beyond those stated here without your explicit consent.

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
content: Consent: For contact form submissions and marketing communications.
Contract: For processing necessary to deliver services you have engaged.
Legitimate interest: For website analytics and service improvement.
Legal obligation: Where required by law.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
content: Contact form data: Retained for up to 2 years unless you become a client.
Client data: Retained for the duration of our business relationship plus 5 years for legal and accounting purposes.
Analytics data: Anonymized and retained for up to 26 months.

sharing.title: 7. Data Sharing
content: We may share data with trusted service providers who assist in operating our business (hosting, email services, analytics). These providers are bound by data processing agreements.
We do not transfer data outside the EU/EEA unless adequate safeguards are in place.
We may disclose data if required by law or to protect our legal rights.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
content: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data.
Erasure: Request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten').
Restriction: Request limitation of processing.
Portability: Receive your data in a portable format.
Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interest.
To exercise these rights, contact us at hello{'@'}eyeonidea.com. We will respond within 30 days.

security.title: 9. Data Security
content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure hosting, and access controls.
While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

what.title: 1. What Are Cookies
content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function properly and provide information to site owners.

types.title: 2. Cookies We Use
content: Essential cookies: Required for the website to function. These cannot be disabled.
Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site (e.g., Google Analytics). These are only set with your consent.
Preference cookies: Remember your settings such as language and theme preferences.

manage.title: 4. Managing Cookies
content: You can manage cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner when you first visit the site.
You can also control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
To opt out of Google Analytics across all websites, you can install the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
content: We may embed content from third parties (e.g., LinkedIn) that set their own cookies. These are governed by the respective third party's privacy policy.
We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any third-party services.

changes.title: Policy Updates
changes.content: We may update these policies periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through our website. The 'last updated' date indicates when the policy was last revised.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.content: If you have questions about our privacy practices or wish to exercise your data rights, please contact us at hello{'@'}eyeonidea.com.
contact.complaints: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Danish Data Protection Agency (Datatilsynet) if you believe your data rights have been violated.
